text.section: Any person who shall impersonate in any way the Director or an inspector by the use of his seal or a counterfeit of his seal, or in any other manner, shall be guilty of a violation of this article and upon conviction thereof shall be punished by a fine of not less than one hundred dollars ($100.00) nor more than five hundred dollars ($500.00) or by imprisonment in the County Jail for not more than one (1) year, or by both such fine and imprisonment in the discretion of the court of appropriate jurisdiction.
